casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
WILSON COUNTY, et al. 41P17-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 5, 2018 Arthur O. Armstrong, for Armstrong, Arthur O.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Plaintiff for Petition for Rehearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of December 2018."
